import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Header from '../Header/Header'; import Footer from '../Footer/Footer'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; function EditProfile() { useEffect(() => { const data = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')).data setState({ ...state, "username": data.username, "email": data.email, }) }, []) const [state, setState] = useState({ address: '', number: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '', response: { stateReturned: null, msgReturned: null, } }); const handleChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target; setState({ ...state, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); }; console.log(state); return (
Profile Billing Security Notifications
Profile Picture
JPG or PNG no larger than 5 MB

); } export default EditProfile;
